OOC: Not to jump in in the middle of this, but couldn't your differences be taken care of out of the RPG? It's not like you don't have each others e-mail addresses. Seriously, half my mail box everyday is all of you fighting about this or that. Shouldn't you care about the RPing instead of what someone is saying about you? 
With love, 
The Vampire Lestat 
 Hollywood Narrator Countdown wrote:    OOC: Let's look at what Cardhead said. "I'll stop when they do." Well, Cardhead is the asshole who started it, isn't he? What a hypocrite...    ----- Original Message -----  From: cardhead649  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com  Sent: Monday, August 05, 2002 7:48 AM Subject: Re: ooC: people... 
I'll stop when they do.  But Rauq, even you have to admit that HNC's 
inaugural rp post wasn't worth the time it took to read the first 
line, let alone the whole thing.  And Lurker's start-up is the most 
over-dramatized entrance I've ever seen - all you need is a shot of 
Dr. Frankenstein throwing a switch and it's a ripoff of every single 
horror movie out there.  

It's improved somewhat since then.

As far as characters are concerned, Terminion and 
Skullertron/Slaughter actually display both personality and 
potential.  The remaining four have been cannon-fodder thus far.

That's my opinion and it's up to you guys to prove me right or wrong 
by roleplaying, not bitching.  And this is a serious RPG, not a 
slapstick movie, so if I see another post/exchange like HNC's first 
one, where everyone involved is an absolute idiot, I will ingore 
every post thereafter made by the perpetrator(s) regardless of who 
they are or think they are.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> I've been lurking around for those wondering. Megatron is waiting 
in 
> the control room for the Predacons, most of which are 'busy' or 
> something. I really don't have much to post about right now, but I 
> still have to read the posts up till when i last checked em.
> 
> I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this obviously aint 
> getting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal shields*
> 
> First think that needs to happen is a cease fire in this flame war 
> between cardhead, lurker, and narrator. it started wrong right from 
> the start. certain things which shouldn't have been said, were 
said, 
> and the replies were less than sucessful at defusing the situation 
> and it blew up. 
> 
> cardhead, if you don't like Narrator's posting style, that's your 
> problem. Telling him that you don't like it, with a bunch of 
> senseless slander isn't going to make him post the way you'd like 
> him to post.
> 
> Narrator, keep ooc comments out of your posting, if you want to say 
> something, say it and no pot shots. And I find it really hard to 
> believe that you managed to put 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up' 
in 
> the same context.
> 
> If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up about this 
> stupid arguement, and get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can 
> say now short of an appologies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me 
> that anyone is growing up.
> 
> *preps for backlash*
